title: Game Character Police Officer
description: Enlist a new male police officer voice in your next game audio production with Game Character Police Officer.
longDescription:
Audio demo


This comprehensive, game-ready collection of human voice-over sound files is tailored for scenarios where an authoritative and dynamic police officer's voice is essential, perfect for crime, action, simulation game genres & situations like chase sequences, interrogations, emergency responses, crime scenes and many more.


Featuring a male protagonist inspired by first-person shooter games, Game Character Police Officer - Male offers over 420 immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files. These include vocalizations, fight efforts, death, pain, laugh, cough, custom character-specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, memorable characters, and outstanding gameplay audio experiences.


Full of Character


The Police Officer’s voice profile is confident, brave, with a full bodied and clear vocal performance. He is perfect for law enforcement agent, guard, detective, an authority figure, protagonist, NPC or any crime fighting game characters needed. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects. 


A police officer voice can be used in various situations, locations, and genres of video games, such as interrogations, emergency responses, responding to calls for help, emergencies, or crime scenes, chase sequences, conflict resolution, radio dispatches, arrests and commands, patrolling, and evidence collection.


Police officer voices are versatile across various game scenarios and locations, such as urban environments (city streets, alleys, parks), police stations (interrogation rooms, briefing rooms), crime scenes (homes, businesses), emergency sites (accident scenes, fire sites), public venues (malls, stadiums), suburban areas (residential neighborhoods), rural locations (small towns, farmlands), high-risk zones (hostage situations, bank heists), transportation hubs (airports, train stations), and tactical operations (raid locations, safe houses). They enhance gameplay across genres like action, adventure, crime, simulation, thriller, horror, survival, RPGs, MMORPGs, and shooters by adding realism and immersion to narratives and gameplay experiences.


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata 


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: Breathing, Coughing, Crying, Custom Lines, Fighting, Laughing, Pain Efforts, Idle and Stock Lines. On top of UCS, AAA Game Character Police Officer features extensive metadata embedded in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time.


Explore the Game Character Police Officer voiceover sound effects library, meticulously crafted with high-quality voice recordings, cohesive scripted dialogue, and dynamic vocalizations. Elevate your game trailers, in-game characters, dramatic moments, and storytelling with immersive sound that brings your narratives to life.


Product details:

422 male soldier voice audio files

409 MB of voice samples

All in 24bit/96k .wav file format

Includes Soundminer Metadata

UCS Compliant

Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library

8 mins of sounds

4 alerted 

5 breathing sounds

12 cough sounds

10 crying sounds

136 immersive female character dialogue lines - like that’s an order, get to the helicopter, sound off if you’re in position

31 fighting vocalizations

16 idle sounds

7 laughing sounds

21 pain and death vocalizations

180 stock dialogue lines you hear in everyday games like yes sir, move in, copy that, affirmative

All Royalty Free

RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
